effect.diamond_pearl: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.platinum: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.platinum: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: An attack that works only on a sleeping foe. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user’s HP.
flavor_text.platinum: An attack that works only on a sleeping foe. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user’s HP.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: An attack that works only on a sleeping foe. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user’s HP.
